columns.name: DCO_AMT_PAY_7_DAYS
columns.title: CO-AMT-PAY-7-DAYS
columns.description:
Amount of payments to the account in the last seven
days. Used in payment protector keys.

columns.name: DCO_AMT_PAY_15_DAYS
columns.title: CO-AMT-PAY-15-DAYS
columns.description:
Amount of payments to the account in the last 15 days.
Used in payment protector keys.

columns.name: DCO_AMT_PAY_25_DAYS
columns.title: CO-AMT-PAY-25-DAYS
columns.description:
Amount of payments to the account in the last 25 days.
Used in payment protector keys.

columns.name: DCO_NUM_PMTS_CTD
columns.title: CO-NUM-PMTS-CTD
columns.description:
Number of payments made to the account cycle-todate.
Used in payment protector keys

columns.name: DCO_NUM_NSF_CTD
columns.title: CO-NUM-NSF-CTD
columns.description:
Number of NSFs on the account cycle-to-date. Used in
payment protector keys.

columns.name: DCO_AMT_NSF_CTD
columns.title: CO-AMT-NSF-CTD
columns.description:
Amount of NSFs on the account cycle-to-date. Used in
payment protector keys.

columns.name: DCO_AMT_LAST_NSF
columns.title: CO-AMT-LAST-NSF
columns.description:
Amount of the last NSF. Used in payment protector
keys.

columns.name: DCO_AMT_CURR_PYMT
columns.title: CO-AMT-CURR-PYMT
columns.description:
The current payment amount. Used in payment
protector keys.

columns.name: DCO_AVG_PMT2_CTD
columns.title: CO-AVG-PMT2-CTD
columns.description:
The average payment amount of all payments applied
to the account during the last two complete billing
cycles and since the last billing date. Used in payment
protector keys.

columns.name: DCO_AVG_PMT3_CTD
columns.title: CO-AVG-PMT3-CTD
columns.description:
The average payment amount of all payments applied
to the account during the last three complete billing
cycles and since the last billing date. Used in payment
protector keys.

columns.name: DCO_AVG_PMT6_CTD
columns.title: CO-AVG-PMT6-CTD
columns.description:
The average payment amount of all payments applied
to the account during the last six complete billing cycles
and since the last billing date. Used in payment
protector keys.

columns.name: DCO_AVG_PMT12_CTD
columns.title: CO-AVG-PMT12-CTD
columns.description:
The average payment amount of all payments applied
to the account during the last twelve complete billing
cycles and since the last billing date. Used in payment
protector keys.

columns.name: DCO_NUM_CASH_ADV1_CTD
columns.title: CO-NUM-CASH-ADV1-CTD
columns.description:
The number of cash advances applied to the account
during the last complete billing cycle plus the number of
cash advances applied to the account since the last
billing cycle. Used in payment protector keys.

columns.name: DCO_AMT_CASH_ADV1_CTD
columns.title: CO-AMT-CASH-ADV1-CTD
columns.description:
The total amount of all cash advances applied to the
account during the last complete billing cycle plus the
total amount of all cash advances applied to the
account since the last billing cycle. Used in payment
protector keys.

columns.name: DCO_DEFAULT_AMOUNT
columns.title: CO-DEFAULT-AMOUNT
columns.description:
The total balance that the account defaulted on when it
entered a default state. Required for Basel analysis and
reporting.

columns.name: DCO_DEFAULT_RECOVERY_AMT
columns.title: CO-DEFAULT-RECOVERY-AMT
columns.description:
The amount of the balance which has been recovered
since the account entered the current default state.
Required for Basel analysis and reporting.

columns.name: DCO_DEFAULT_TOT_RCVRY_AMT
columns.title: CO-DEFAULT-TOT-RCVRY-AMT
columns.description:
The total amount of recoveries made on the account
across all default conditions.

columns.name: DCO_NUM_PTP
columns.title: CO-NUM-PTP
columns.description:
The total number of Promises to Pay made on the
account since it was opened. Potentially used in
scorecard characteristics, especially for collections
models.

columns.name: DCO_FINANCIAL_DATA_6
columns.title: CO-FINANCIAL-DATA-6
columns.description:
"Balance transfers balance on the account for the last 6
months."

>>CO-MTHLY-BALANCE	"CA: -1 * TI-CA-MIN-BALANCE
RV: TI-RV-CYCLE-BALANCE
LN:  TI-LN-BALANCE
MG: TI-MG-BALANCE"
>>CO-MTHLY-DEBITS	"RV, LN, MG :Set to zero
CA: TI-CA-VAL-CUST-DEBITS"
>>CO-MTHLY-CREDITS	"CA: TI-CA-VAL-CUST-CREDITS
RV: TI-RV-VAL-PAYMENTS
LN: TI-LN-VAL-PAYMENTS
MG:TI-MG-VAL-PAYMENTS
"
>>CO-MTHLY-NUM-NSF	"CA, LN, MG :Set to zero
RV:TI-RV-NO-NSF"
CO-FINANCIAL-DATA-12	Financial data fields which occur 12 times
>>CO-DELQ	"
12 occurrences of delinquency/missed payment status for the account, where occurrence 1 is the current status and occurrences 2-12 are for the previous cycles/months. Used for reclass/cure definition and for decision keys.  Occurence 1 used as exclusion, and 1 & 2 as an event. 

Values:  
0:  current/upto date 
1:  credit dormant / past due (if past due collections is to be implemented)
2:  1 cycle/1-30 days excess
3:  2 cycle/31-60 days excess
4:  3 cycle/61-90 days excess
5:  4 cycle/91-120 days excess 
up to value of 9. 

Atención: Está corrido respecto al segmento RV"
>>CO-MTHLY-INTEREST	"CA:TI-CA-VAL-DEBIT-INTEREST
RV:TI-RV-VAL-INTEREST
LN:TI-LN-VAL-INTEREST
MG:TI-MG-VAL-INTEREST"
>>CO-MTHLY-PROFIT	"CA: TI-CA-PROFIT
RV:TI-RV-PROFIT
LN:TI-LN-PROFIT
MG:TI-MG-PROFIT
"
>>CO-MTHLY-REVENUE	"CA: TI-CA-PROFIT
RV:TI-RV-PROFIT
LN:TI-LN-PROFIT
MG:TI-MG-PROFIT
"
>>CO-MTHLY-NUM-DEBITS	"RV, LN, MG :Set to zero
CA: TI-CA-NUM-CUST-DEBITS"
>>CO-MTHLY-FEES	"CA: TI-CA-VAL-TOTAL-FEES
RV:TI-RV-VAL-TOTAL-FEES
LN:TI-LN-VAL-TOTAL-FEES
MG:TI-MG-VAL-TOTAL-FEES
"
>>CO-MTHLY-REBATES	set to 0
>>CO-BAL-XFER-BAL	"Balance transfers balance on the account for the last 12
months."
>>CO-BAL-XFER-NUM	"Number of balance transfer transactions to the account
for the last 12 months."

columns.name: DCO_USR_DF_WORSE_TRIGGER1
columns.title: CO-USR-DF-WORSE-TRIGGER1
columns.description: Cuando hay cambio de score a peor hay que poner valor fijo 1 en ese campo (trigger de collections)

columns.name: DCO_USR_DF_WORSE_TRIGGER2
columns.title: CO-USR-DF-WORSE-TRIGGER2
columns.description: Cuando el cliente entra en hold date hay que poner valor fijo 1 en ese campo (trigger de collections)

columns.name: DCO_USR_DF_WORSE_TRIGGER3
columns.title: CO-USR-DF-WORSE-TRIGGER3
columns.description: Cuando hay cambio en el riesgo del cliente que estaba en cero y va a peor hay que poner valor fijo 1 en ese campo (trigger de collections)

columns.name: DCO_USR_DF_WORSE_TRIGGER4
columns.title: CO-USR-DF-WORSE-TRIGGER4
columns.description: Cuando hay cambio en la Mora 404 se prende indicador con valor fijo = 1

columns.name: DCO_USR_DF_BETTER_TRIGGER1
columns.title: CO-USR-DF-BETTER-TRIGGER1
columns.description: Cuando hay cambio de score a mejor hay que poner valor fijo 1 en ese campo (trigger de collections)

columns.name: DCO_USR_DF_BETTER_TRIGGER2
columns.title: CO-USR-DF-BETTER-TRIGGER2
columns.description: Cuando el cliente sale del hold date (a mejor) hay que poner valor fijo 1 en ese campo (trigger de collections)

columns.name: DCO_USR_DF_BETTER_TRIGGER3
columns.title: CO-USR-DF-BETTER-TRIGGER3
columns.description: Cuando el indicador de gestión 48hs se activa se lanza el trigger con valor fijo = 1

columns.name: DCO_USR_DF_BETTER_TRIGGER4
columns.title: CO-USR-DF-BETTER-TRIGGER4
columns.description: Cuando la clave 502 (estados cacs) cambia de cero a no cero o viceversa, se lanza el trigger con valor fijo = 1

columns.name: DCO_STGY_ID

columns.name: DCO_CO_EXCLUSION_IND
columns.title: CO-CO-EXCLUSION-IND
columns.description:
0 - No Excluir
1 - Excluir por codigo C20 - Supervision
2 - Excluir por codigo C15 - Pendiente Respuesta Filial
3 - Contrato en Mora Tardia
4 - Estado de CACS que implique exclusion interna (uso futuro)

columns.name: DCO_DATE_BILL_EQV
columns.title: CO-DATE-BILL-EQV
columns.description: First time 0. Then, feedback.

columns.name: DCO_DATE_FIRST_COLLS_DA
columns.title: CO-DATE-FIRST-COLLS-DA
columns.description:
Date that the account or customer was first managed by
the collections decision area for the current out of order
condition. Zero when account is not being managed by
the decision area. Otherwise mapped from PR20-
DATE-FIRST-COLLS-DA.

columns.name: DCO_COLL_BALANCE_INITIAL
columns.title: CO-COLL-BALANCE-INITIAL
columns.description:
Out-of-order amount of the customer/account when the
collections process began. Field required for TRIAD.
Used for reporting. Mapped from PR20-COLLBALANCE-
INITIAL at previous collections call.

columns.name: DCO_COLL_BALANCE_PREV
columns.title: CO-COLL-BALANCE-PREV
columns.description:
Balance that was being collected on at the last call to
TRIAD, as distinct from TI-CO-BALANCE-PREV which
may contain the value as at the point of scenario
assignment. This field is used for reporting of any
payments received for accounts being processed in
collections. Mapped from PR20-COLL-BALANCEACTUAL
at previous collections call.

columns.name: DCO_PREV_NONMON_SPID
columns.title: CO-PREV-NONMON-SPID
columns.description:
SPID for the scenario the account was assigned before
entering into a special "holding" scenario, such as a
promise-to-pay scenario. The data in this field is used in
specific Collections reports when the currently assigned
scenario is marked as "Track cure to previous
scenario". In this way, you can show on certain
Collections reports the scenario under which the
account was actually treated as opposed to the
"holding" scenario to which the scenario has been
reassigned.

columns.name: DCO_PREV_NONMON_RDG_LOWLMT
columns.title: CO-PREV-NONMON-RDG-LOWLMT
columns.description: Lower bound digits of the sample group.

columns.name: DCO_PREV_NONMON_RDG_UPLMT
columns.title: CO-PREV-NONMON-RDG-UPLMT
columns.description: Upper bound digits of the sample group.

columns.name: DCO_PREV_NONMON_STRATEGY
columns.title: CO-PREV-NONMON-STRATEGY
columns.description:
Strategy ID of the scenario the account was assigned
before entering into a special "holding" scenario, such
as a promise-to-pay scenario. The data in this field is
used in specific Collections reports when the currently
assigned scenario is marked as "Track cure to previous
scenario". In this way, you can show on certain
Collections reports the scenario under which the
account was actually treated as opposed to the
"holding" scenario to which the scenario has been
reassigned.

columns.name: DCO_PREV_NONMON_SCENARIO
columns.title: CO-PREV-NONMON-SCENARIO
columns.description:
Scenario ID for the scenario the account was assigned
before entering into a special "holding" scenario, such
as a promise-to-pay scenario. The data in this field is
used in specific Collections reports when the currently
assigned scenario is marked as "Track cure to previous
scenario". In this way, you can show on certain
Collections reports the scenario under which the
account was actually treated as opposed to the
"holding" scenario to which the scenario has been

columns.name: DCO_PREV_NONMON_SCEN_SEG
columns.title: CO-PREV-NONMON-SCEN-SEG
columns.description:
Analysis segment identifier of the scenario the account
was assigned before entering into a special "holding"
scenario, such as a promise-to-pay scenario. The data
in this field is used in specific Collections reports when
the currently assigned scenario is marked as "Track
cure to previous scenario". In this way, you can show on
certain Collections reports the scenario under which the
account was actually treated as opposed to the "holding" scenario to which the scenario has been
reassigned.
